doc.field: Series IV. Film and Video Recordings
Series IV. Film and Video Recordings

Series IV. Film and Video Recordings includes Sondheim's work as a filmmaker on a variety of film, video, and digital formats. Much of his filmography includes digital avatars that are manipulated with 3D image warping software. He has also shot a large collection of travel and nature photography and videography. This series also includes some work by Sondheim's contemporaries and collaborators, such as Kathy Acker, Guy deBord, Leslie Thornton, and Laurie Anderson. Much of Sondeim's work includes sexual content and nudity, and viewer discretion is advised.
